notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast.
Affects every allied unit, including illusions, invulnerable units and hidden units, excluding wards and buildings.
abilities.description: Restores 75 mana to all nearby allies.

additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
name: Arcane Ring
description: Once a prized heirloom of a minor lord's house.
trivia: Arcane Boots was originally created as Arcane Ring, being built out of Ring of Protection + Energy Booster + Recipe. Its recipe got changed and its theme reworked into Arcane Boots in version 6.68.
Arcane Ring's appearance is designed after this as well, sharing aesthetics with Arcane Boots.
tips: Using Replenish Mana every time it is off cooldown is equivalent to 1.67 mana per second, 2.07 mana regeneration when considering the 0.4 mana regeneration bonus from intelligence as well.
